title: Test Article from Azure Function Deployment
excerpt: This is a test article to verify the Azure Function can successfully import articles to the website
content:
This is a test article created to verify the article import API endpoint is working correctly.

The Azure Function will use this same endpoint to import news articles every 3 hours.
author: Azure Function Test
seo_title: Test Article | Azure Function Deployment Test
seo_description: Testing the article import API endpoint for Azure Function integration
